name: Super Slime Skateboarding
description:
Super Slime Skateboarding is a game where you are a slime that is collecting apples so it can make applesauce with it's grandma! You have to collect enough apples and get to grandma while dodging trashcans and rotten apples!

Super Slime Skateboarding is my first game I have ever finished. It was made for a video game making contest for FBLA. I got 4th In the state of Missouri and at the national competition I did not place. I had a lot of fun and I am planning to make more games that are better than this one. There will be no updates because I want to keep it the way it was when I submitted it and also because the code is well...  a truckload of spaghetti would be a BIG understatement!
